videos.headline: Virginia Tech's Robinson launches deep buzzer-beating 3-pointer
videos.description: Justin Robinson beats the half-time buzzer with deep 3, to push Virginia Tech's lead over Ball State to 43-29.

videos.headline: Fan protects child from wild pass with quick-thinking kick save
videos.description: A fan at the Charleston Classic fends off an errant pass heading towards his child, but ends up spilling his beer in the process.

article.description: Nickeil Alexander-Walker scored 21 points as No. 16 Virginia Tech opened the Charleston Classic with a 73-64 victory over Ball State.

video.headline: Virginia Tech's Hill catches lob off the backboard & throws down 2-handed slam
video.caption: Virginia Tech's Ahmed Hill rises up and throws down massive two-handed dunk from Justin Robinson's pass off the backboard.
video.description: Virginia Tech's Ahmed Hill rises up and throws down massive two-handed dunk from Justin Robinson's pass off the backboard.
video.title: Virginia Tech's Hill catches lob off the backboard & throws down 2-handed slam

article.headline: No. 16 Virginia Tech tops Ball State 73-64

images.name: Virginia Tech's Hill catches lob off the backboard & throws down 2-handed slam
images.caption: Virginia Tech's Ahmed Hill rises up and throws down massive two-handed dunk from Justin Robinson's pass off the backboard.

article.linkText: No. 16 Virginia Tech tops Ball State 73-64
article.story: CHARLESTON, S.C. -- Nickeil Alexander-Walker scored 21 points as No. 16 Virginia Tech opened the Charleston Classic with a 73-64 victory over Ball State. The Hokies (2-0) watched a 16-point lead slip to 49-44 midway through the second half before going on a 14-4 run to take control. Virginia Tech will play the winner of the next game, Alabama vs. Northeastern, in Friday's semifinals. Tayler Persons led Ball State (1-2) with 21 points. The Cardinals will play the Alabama-Northeastern loser on Friday.

statistics.description: Free Throw makes and attempts.

statistics.name: assists
statistics.description: The number of times a player who passes the ball to a teammate in a way that leads to a score by field goal, meaning that he or she was "assisting" in the basket. There is some judgment involved in deciding whether a passer should be credited with an assist.

statistics.name: turnovers
statistics.description: The number of times a player loses possession to the other team.

statistics.name: minutes
statistics.description: The total number of minutes played.

statistics.name: assistTurnoverRatio
statistics.description: The average number of assists a player or team records per turnover

statistics.name: rebounds
statistics.description: The total number of rebounds (offensive and defensive).

statistics.name: defensiveRebounds
statistics.description: The number of times when the defense obtains the possession of the ball after a missed shot by the offense.
